dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 50,000 training images and 10,000 test images. It is commonly used for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset consisting of 70,000 28x28 grayscale images of clothing items, divided into 10 categories. It serves as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
T. Wang
A. Coates
A. Bissacco
B. Wu
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN is a real-world image dataset obtained from house numbers in Google Street View images, containing 73,257 training images and 26,032 test images. It is used for digit recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: SVHN
